trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje vytvárať a odosielať fotografie.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Stránky, ktoré navštevujete, môžu požiadať o prezradenie vašej polohy.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje tvoriť a nahrávať videá.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje ukladať a nahrávať fotografie.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Kedykoľvek si vyčistite celú históriu prehliadania, heslá a cookies. Stačí vám na to jedno ťuknutie.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: Hľadáte niečo iné? Vyberte si iný vyhľadávací modul.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Súkromné prehliadanie na úplne inej úrovni. Blokujte reklamy a ostatný obsah, ktorý vás môže sledovať naprieč stránkami.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Posuňte svoje súkromie na vyššiu úroveň
trans-unit.note: Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: %@ vyvíja Mozilla. Naša misia je podporovať zdravý a otvorený internet.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Vyhľadávajte a prehliadajte priamo prostredníctvom aplikácie
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Blokujte sledovacie prvky (v nastaveniach môžete sledovacie prvky povoliť)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Vymažte cookies, históriu vyhľadávania a prehliadania
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen
Label for row in About screen
Link to Privacy Notice in the About screen
Label for row in About screen
Label for row in About screen

trans-unit.target: Vylepšite svoje súkromie blokovaním sledovacích prvkov
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block web fonts to reduce page size
trans-unit.target: Zmenšite veľkosť stránok blokovaním webových písiem
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a Safari extension:
trans-unit.target: Používajte ho ako rozšírenie pre Safari:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

%@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, takes the user to a page with information about the product. Also displayed as a header for the About page.
Label on About screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Button to dismiss the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.

trans-unit.source: An error occured while adding the pass to Wallet. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Pri pridávaní lístkov do aplikácie Wallet nastala chyba. Skúste to, prosím, neskôr.
trans-unit.note: Message of the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.
Title of the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.

trans-unit.target: Pre návrat do aplikácie %@ sa vyžaduje overenie
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Prompt shown to ask the user to use Touch ID, Face ID, or passcode to continue browsing after returning to the app.
Label for button to add a custom URL
Label for error state when entering an invalid URL
A label displaying an example URL
Label for the input to add a custom URL
Placeholder for the input field to add a custom URL
Label for button to add a custom URL with the + prefix

trans-unit.target: Bola pridaná nová vlastná URL adresa.
trans-unit.note: Label for toast alerting a custom URL has been added

trans-unit.source: Enable to have %@ autocomplete over 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
trans-unit.target: Povolením tejto možnosti umožníte aplikácii %@ automaticky dokončovať viac než 450 populárnych URL adries.
trans-unit.note: Description for enabling or disabling the default list. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
label describing URL Autocomplete as disabled
Label for toast alerting that the custom URL being added is a duplicate

trans-unit.target: Žiadne vlastné URL adresy na zobrazenie
trans-unit.note: Label for button to add a custom URL
label describing URL Autocomplete as enabled
Label for button taking you to your custom Autocomplete URL list
Label for enabling or disabling autocomplete

trans-unit.source: Enable to have %@ autocomplete your favorite URLs.
trans-unit.target: Ak chcete, aby %@ automaticky dopĺňal vaše obľúbené adresy, aktivujte túto funkciu.
trans-unit.note: Description for adding and managing custom autocomplete URLs. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Label for enabling or disabling top sites
Title for the action button shown on the Splash Screen which gives the user the ability to log in with biometrics.
Create a new session after failing a biometric check
Accessibility label for the back button
Copy URL button in URL long press menu
Accessibility label for the forward button
Accessibility label for the reload button
Accessibility label for the settings button
Accessibility label for the stop button
Label on button to complete edits
Label on button to allow edits
Button label to reload the error page
Button label used for cancelling to open another app from Focus
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Button label for opening another app from Focus
Button label in external link dialog to cancel the dialog. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in mailto: dialog to send an email. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Accessibility label for done button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for next result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Label on button to dismiss first run UI
Message label on the first run screen
Button label used to close a menu that displays as a popup.

trans-unit.source: The Internet connection appears to be offline.
trans-unit.target: Zdá sa, že internetové pripojenie je offline.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when no internet connection is available
Button text for retrying network connection
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.target: Rýchly. Zameraný na súkromie. Žiadne rozptyľovanie.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for the onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen
Text for a label that indicates the title of the bottom button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: We clear your history when you close the app for extra privacy.
trans-unit.target: Po zatvorení aplikácie vymažeme vašu históriu, aby ste získali väčšie súkromie.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the first subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Make %@ your default to protect your data with every link you open.
trans-unit.target: Nastavte si %@ ako predvolený, aby ste ochránili svoje údaje pri každom otvorení odkazu.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the second subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of the top button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: Vymažte svoju históriu prehliadania, heslá, súbory cookie a zabráňte tomu, aby vás prenasledovali nechcené reklamy, a to jednoduchým kliknutím!
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: %@ je prehliadač špecializovaný na ochranu súkromia s automatickou ochranou pred sledovaním a blokovaním reklám.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.
Used as a text for the link in Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.Text.

trans-unit.source: Firefox cares about your privacy. Read more in %@.
trans-unit.target: Firefox sa stará o vaše súkromie. Podrobnosti nájdete v dokumente %@.
trans-unit.note: Text that describes Firefox's commitment to privacy. %@ is a link using Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.LinkText as text.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.
trans-unit.target: Nakonfigurujte nastavenia, aby ste sa mohli rozhodnúť, koľko alebo ako málo budete zdieľať.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Take your private browsing to the next level.
trans-unit.target: Posuňte svoje súkromné prehliadanie na vyššiu úroveň.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for onboarding screen.
Label for the agreement button in the Terms of Use screen.
Label for the agreement button in the Terms of Use screen.
Button label to dismiss the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use screen.
Used as a text for the link in Onboarding.TermsOfUse.Text.

trans-unit.target: Rýchly. Zameraný na súkromie. Žiadne rozptyľovanie.
trans-unit.note: Subtitle for the Terms of Use screen during onboarding.
Text that describes the agreement to the Firefox Terms of Use. %@ is a link using Onboarding.TermsOfUse.LinkText as text.
Title for the Terms of Use screen during onboarding. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title for onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Tap Safari, then select Content Blockers
trans-unit.target: Ťuknite na Safari a vyberte Blokátory obsahu
trans-unit.note: Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.target: Vyberte Safari a potom vyberte Rozšírenia
trans-unit.note: Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Error label when the blocker is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when disabled. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Save button label

trans-unit.source: That didn’t work. Try replacing the search term with this: %s.
trans-unit.target: To nefungovalo. Skúste nahradiť vyhľadávaný výraz s: %s.
trans-unit.note: Label for error state when entering an invalid search engine URL. %s is a search term in a URL.
Label for disable option on search suggestions prompt
Label for enable option on search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.source: To get suggestions, %@ needs to send what you type in the address bar to the search engine.
trans-unit.target: Ak chcete získavať návrhy vyhľadávania, %@ bude odosielať vami písaný text vyhľadávaciemu modulu.
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Label for search suggestions prompt message
Title for search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.source: This helps Mozilla to estimate active users.
trans-unit.target: Toto pomáha spoločnosti Mozilla odhadnúť počet aktívnych používateľov.
trans-unit.note: On the Settings screen, this is the subtitle text for a toggle which controls sending daily usage ping.
On the Settings screen, this is the title text for a toggle which controls automatically sending daily usage ping.
Text for button to add another search engine in settings
Title on add search engine settings screen
Header for rows of installed search engines
Label for input field for the name of the search engine to be added
Toast displayed after adding a search engine
Label for button to bring deleted default engines back
Placeholder text for input of new search engine name
Label for input of search engine template

trans-unit.source: Paste or enter search string. If necessary, replace search term with: %s.
trans-unit.target: Prilepte alebo zadajte hľadaný reťazec. V prípade potreby nahraďte hľadaný výraz výrazom: %s.
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input of new search engine template
Title for the URL Autocomplete row

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and web pages.
trans-unit.target: Blokovanie ostatných sledovacích prvkov môže rozbiť niektoré videá a webové stránky.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when toggling the Content blocker
Button label for declining Content blocker alert
Button label for accepting Content blocker alert
Dark theme option in settings menu

trans-unit.source: This helps us diagnose and fix issues with the browser.
trans-unit.target: Toto nám pomáha diagnostikovať a riešiť problémy s prehliadačom.
trans-unit.note: Description associated with the Crash Reports toggle on settings screen

trans-unit.source: %@ will send what you type in the address bar to your search engine.
trans-unit.target: %@ bude odosielať vami písaný text vyhľadávaciemu modulu.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Search Suggestions toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla sa usiluje zbierať len údaje, ktoré potrebujeme na vylepšenie aplikácie %@ pre všetkých.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Send Usage Data toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: %@ may install and run studies from time to time.
trans-unit.target: %@ môže občas inštalovať a spúšťať štúdie.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Studies toggle on the settings screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Title for section in settings menu
Subtitle for Send Anonymous Usage Data toggle on main screen
Lincese option in settings menu. Tapping the cell will take the user to a list of licences for the 3rd parties used in the app.
Light theme option in settings menu
%@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, allows the user to leave a review for the app on the app store.
Label for Safari integration section
Title for settings screen
Label for the search engine in the search screen
Label for the Search Suggestions toggle row
Title for the search selection screen

Section label for privacy toggles
Label title for set as default browser row

trans-unit.source: Set links from websites, emails and messages to open automatically in %@.
trans-unit.target: Nastavte si automatické otváranie webových stránok, e‑mailov a správ v prehliadači %@.
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Description for set as default browser option.

Theme section in settings menu

Label for the checkbox to toggle Social trackers

trans-unit.source: Use Face ID to unlock app

trans-unit.target: Face ID môže odomknúť %@ ak je URL v aplikácii už otvorené
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Description for 'Enable Face ID' displayed under its respective toggle in the settings menu.
Show home screen tips toggle label on settings screen
Safari toggle label on settings screen

trans-unit.source: Use Touch ID to unlock app

trans-unit.source: Touch ID can unlock %@ if a URL is already open in the app
trans-unit.target: Touch ID môže odomknúť %@ ak je URL v aplikácii už otvorené
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Description for 'Enable Touch ID' displayed under its respective toggle in the settings menu.
Status off for tracking protection in settings screen
Status on for tracking protection in settings screen

trans-unit.target: Použiť tmavú/svetlú tému vzhľadu podľa systému
trans-unit.note: Value for theme toggle in settings menu
Title for settings section to enable different Siri Shortcuts.

Toast displayed to the user after adding the item to the Shortcuts.

Toast displayed to the user after removing the item from the Shortcuts.

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to reload the site as a mobile device

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website inside the app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to share the current website they are on through another app.
Text for the long press on a shortcut option in context menu.
Text for the long press on a shortcut rename option in context menu.
Text for the placeholder textfield on rename shortcut alert.
Text for the rename shortcut alert primary action.
Text for the rename shortcut alert secondary action.
This is the button text that is displayed in the Show Me How Onboarding Screen

trans-unit.source: Long press on the Home screen until the icons start to jiggle.
trans-unit.target: Ťuknite a dlho držte na ploche, kým sa ikony nezačnú chvieť.
trans-unit.note: This is the subtitle text for step one that is displayed in the Show Me How Onboarding Screen

trans-unit.source: Search for %@. Then choose a widget.
trans-unit.note: This is the subtitle text for step three that is displayed in the Show Me How onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.target: Ťuknite na ikonu so znakom plus.
trans-unit.note: This is the subtitle text for step two that is displayed in the Show Me How Onboarding Screen
This is the title text that is displayed in the Show Me How Onboarding Screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Button to add a favorite URL to Siri.
Button to add a specified shortcut option to Siri.
Label for button to edit the Siri phrase or delete the Siri functionality.
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase and then open the app.
Title for screen to add a favorite URL to Siri.
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to open a specified URL in Focus/Klar.
Label for input to set a favorite URL to be opened by Siri.

trans-unit.source: Lock %@ when a site is open:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for biometric tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the description for biometric Face ID tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for biometric Touch ID tip.

trans-unit.target: Akcie stránky > Verzia stránky pre počítače
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for request desktop tip.

trans-unit.source: Want to see the full desktop version of a site?
trans-unit.target: Chcete vidieť plnú verziu stránky pre počítače?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for request desktop tip.

Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. %@ is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.
Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Select Add to Shortcuts from the %@ menu
trans-unit.target: Z ponuky prehliadača %@ zvoľte Pridať medzi Skratky
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for shortcuts tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:
trans-unit.target: Vytvorte si odkazy na stránky, ktoré najčastejšie navštevujete:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: Chýba na stránke obsah alebo sa správa zvláštne?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Ak chcete spravovať konkrétne možnosti ochrany osobných údajov a zabezpečenia, prejdite do časti Nastavenia.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Tieto predvolené nastavenia ponúkajú silnú ochranu. Je však ľahké vyladiť nastavenia tak, aby vyhovovali vašim špecifickým potrebám.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Start your private browsing session, and we’ll block trackers and other bad stuff as you go.
trans-unit.target: Začnite svoju reláciu súkromného prehliadania a my zablokujeme sledovacie prvky a iné zlé veci.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Search Bar tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ zabránil tejto stránke, aby vás špehovala. Ťuknutím na štít získate informácie o tom, čo sme zablokovali.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Got ‘em! We stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield any time to see what we’re blocking.
trans-unit.target: Máme ich! Zabránili sme tejto stránke špehovať vás. Kedykoľvek ťuknite na štít, aby ste videli, čo všetko blokujeme.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip when we block trackers for the first time on a website

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: Ťuknutím na kôš kedykoľvek odstránite všetky stopy vašej aktuálnej relácie.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: Tap here to trash it all — history, cookies, everything — and start fresh on a new tab.
trans-unit.target: Ťuknutím sem všetko vyhodíte do koša – históriu, súbory cookie, všetko – a začnete odznova na novej karte.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip
This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip
Label displayed for button used as a shortcut to add a link to the list of URLs to autocomplete.
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar
Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.
Text for a menu displayed from the bottom of the screen when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page
Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar. %@ is the text type by the user.
Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for the action button shown on card view that will take the user to a tutorial explaining the user how to add an widget

trans-unit.source: We’ll leave you to your private browsing, but get a quicker start next time with the %@ widget on your Home screen.
trans-unit.target: Necháme vás v súkromnom prehliadaní, ale nabudúce môžete začať rýchlejšie s miniaplikáciou %@ na ploche.
trans-unit.note: Subtitle shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Title shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option
Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. %@ is the name of the application to open the current page.
Toast displayed after a URL has been copied to the clipboard
Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. %1$@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”), %2$@ is the app it wants to open.
Text displayed as an example of the template to add a search engine.
Text for a share button
Text for the share menu when a user wants to copy a URL.
Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is not secure
Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is secure
Title for the tracking settings page to change what trackers are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session
trans-unit.target: Ochrana je v tejto relácii vypnutá
trans-unit.note: Text for the status off from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Protections are ON for this session
trans-unit.target: Ochrana je v tejto relácii zapnutá
trans-unit.note: Text for the status on from Tracking Protection.
Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.
Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. %@ is replaced with the install date of the application.

trans-unit.target: Sledovacie prvky a skripty, ktoré je možné blokovať
trans-unit.note: Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Content blocking and tracking protection from Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Blokovanie obsahu a ochrana pred sledovaním od Mozilly
trans-unit.note: Human readable description

trans-unit.source: Add a %@ shortcut to your Home screen. After adding the widget, touch and hold to edit it and select a different shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Pridajte si na plochu skratku pre %@. Po pridaní miniaplikácie ju upravte ťuknutím a podržaním a vyberte inú skratku.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Start a private search in %@ with your default search engine.
trans-unit.target: Začnite súkromné vyhľadávanie v prehliadači %@ pomocou vášho predvoleného vyhľadávacieho modulu.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).
Quick Actions title when widget enters edit mode
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).
